backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing CRUD operations for exercises, workouts, and weight entries with validation for equipment types and muscle groups.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the muscle group text capitalization feature across ExerciseCard, ExerciseLibrary, LogWeight, WorkoutForm, and formatting utilities.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the FitTrack Pro fitness tracking application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode OKLCH color variables and custom design tokens for the fitness app theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the FitTrack Pro application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, exercises, workouts, logging, and progress pages within a dark theme provider.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseCard.tsx: Exercise card component with edit/delete dialogs, color-coded badges for equipment and muscle groups, and capitalized muscle group display using formatting utility.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header navigation with app branding and links to Home, Exercises, Workouts, Log, and Progress pages with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing Internet Identity authentication and creating backend actor instances with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on exercises, workouts, and weight entries, including filtering by equipment/muscle group and invalidating caches on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, design tokens (radius, borders, charts), and Google Fonts imports for Inter and Rajdhani.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseLibrary.tsx: Exercise library page with filtering by equipment/muscle group, seeding functionality, and a dialog for creating new exercises with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page displaying hero section and feature cards linking to Exercise Library, Workouts, Log Weight, and Progress sections with call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/LogWeight.tsx: Form page for logging weight entries with exercise selection, weight/reps/sets inputs, success feedback, and automatic form reset after submission.
frontend/src/pages/WeightProgress.tsx: Displays weight progress tracking for selected exercises with trend indicators (up/down/same) and formatted date entries in a card-based list view.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutDetail.tsx: Shows detailed view of a single workout including its name and number of exercises, with navigation back to workouts list.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing workouts with name input and exercise selection, supporting search filtering and multi-select functionality.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutsList.tsx: Lists user workouts with empty state and navigation to create new workouts via a button.
frontend/src/utils/formatting.ts: Utility function that capitalizes the first letter of each word in a string, used for consistent muscle group name display.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, font families (Inter, Rajdhani), and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the workout tracker application state, including a completed feature for capitalizing muscle group text display throughout the UI.
